Hi, just wish to thank you all again for the warm welcome, and I did try to=
 go to that wiki site, but can't, because for some reason the link doesn't =
work. But I'd love to read that site, Kraftlos.  And Lady B, thank you for =
the warm welcome as well. I think I'm really gonna like it here.
